# Exercise 6

```{r}
normal.mean.CI <- function(x){
  xbar <- mean(x)
  s <- sd(x)
  n <- length(x)
  tmp1 <- 1.96*s/sqrt(n)
  ret <- c(xbar-tmp1,xbar+tmp1)
  return(ret)
}

normal.mean.CI(runif(1000))
```
